sentence.Network_en: I am sorry to have to inflict my company upon you.
sentence.Network_cn: 对不起,我不得不打扰你一下.

sentence.Network_en: Don't inflict your ideas on me.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要把你的想法强加于我.

sentence.Network_en: Never inflict useless pain on dumb animals.
sentence.Network_cn: 切勿给不会说话的动物施加无谓的痛苦.

list.abs: his parents died from tortures inflicted by their feudal lords .他的父母是被封建领主的酷刑折磨而死的。
... 7.uninterrupted adj. 不间断的；连续的 inflict on 使承担（痛苦，负担等）；给以（打击，惩罚等） root out 根除；连根拔起；发现.

...惩罚与教育相结合 combination of punishment and education处以刑罚 inflict punishment处以有期徒刑 sentence to fixed-term imprisonment.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'afflict, trouble'): from Latin inflict- 'struck against', from the verb infligere, from in- 'into' + fligere 'to strike'

entry.tran: 予以(打击);使遭受(损伤、苦痛等)
entry.def: To inflict harm or damage on someone or something means to make them suffer it.

example.ex: Rebels say they have inflicted heavy casualties on government forces...
example.tran: 反叛武装称他们使政府军遭受重创。

example.ex: ...the damage being inflicted on Britain's industries by the recession...
example.tran: 经济衰退使英国工业遭受的损失

sentences.sentence: "The principal visited his rage on the students"

auth_sentence.content: Even bruised, the Yankees can still inflict pain.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even bruised, the Yankees can still inflict pain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even bruised, the Yankees can still inflict pain.

auth_sentence.content: The object was to inflict punishment, then death.
auth_sentence.res_content: The object was to inflict punishment, then death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The object was to inflict punishment, then death.

auth_sentence.content: These groups continue to inflict unspeakable crimes on innocents.
auth_sentence.res_content: These groups continue to inflict unspeakable crimes on innocents.

stems_affixes.word_buile: af一再+flict打+ion表名词→一再打→折磨
inflict[v.使遭受[损伤,苦痛等],使承受[on,upon]]+ion表名词→n.[强加于人身的]痛苦,刑罚

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使身体或精神受痛苦,折磨
使遭受[损伤,苦痛等],使承受[on,upon]
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+flict打击→进入打斗→导致痛苦

means.word_mean: 把…强加给, 使承受, 遭受;打击；使吃苦头

sentences.en: Mary inflicted her children on her mother for the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末玛丽硬把孩子们交给母亲照料。
